Venues.Message:
1. Entry is allowed only for valid ticket holders. Forwarded messages are not accepted.
2. Smoking/Alcohol/Drugs consumed persons are strictly not allowed in the theater premises.
3. Ticket mandatory for children of age 3 years & above.
4. For damaged or lost 3D glasses, Rs. 100 would be charged per glass.
5. 3D glasses should be handed over at the exit, after the movie completion.
6. Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside the cinema premises.
7. Decision(s) taken by cinema management is final & ``reserved for rights``.
Venues.VenueAdd: Edarapalle, Near Ganapathi Theatre, Amalapuram, Andhra Pradesh 533201, India
